A: Which prophecy came to pass with the birth of Jesus Christ years later? (a) The prophecy of the kingdom of God (b) The prophecy of the birth of Jesus (c) The prophecy of agony
Which Prophet foretold the birth of Jesus? (a) Isaiah (b) Jeremiah (c) Daniel
The meaning of Emmanuel illustrates that God is always (a) With us and around us every second, minute and hour (b) God always care for us (c) God always gives us life
God is the one who is always protecting and guiding us (a) True (b) False
What is the first attribute that the Prophet said His name shall be called? (a) Emmanuel (b) Wonderful (c) Counsellor
For us to serve God, expect Him to guide our path and comfort us, we must ask for His Holy Spirit to live in us (a) True (b) False
For unto us a child is born, unto us a Son is given, and the government shall be upon His (a) Hand (b) Head (c) Shoulder

And His name shall be called (a) Wonderful, Counselor, Jehovah, Everlasting God (b) Wonderful, Counselor, The Mighty God, Yahweh (c) Wonderful, Counselor, The Mighty God, The Everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace
On the day of Pentecost, the disciples of Jesus came together in a house in (a) Bethlehem (b) Rome (c) Jerusalem
As they were praying together, a came down suddenly from the sky like the rush of a powerful mighty wind, and filled the house (a) Manner (b) Angel (c) Voice
Who is the Holy Spirit? (a) God, living in us (b) God
B: The meaning of Emmanuel illustrates that God is always _________.
For unto us a child is born, unto us a Son is given, and the government shall be upon His _________.
